title: NHANES Age Prediction: Summer Analytics 2025 Hackathon Experience
excerpt: Participating in the Summer Analytics Hackathon 2025 to classify adult vs senior age groups using NHANES health survey data.

title: Taming Noisy Satellite Data: My Kaggle Journey with NDVI Land Cover Classification
excerpt: A beginner’s guide to building a machine learning pipeline for NDVI time-series data to classify land cover types in a Kaggle hackathon.

title: Flappy Bird — Java Swing Edition
excerpt: A simple recreation of Flappy Bird using Java Swing, demonstrating animation, collision detection, and GUI rendering.

title: Dynamic Pricing for Urban Parking Lots
excerpt: Intelligent dynamic pricing engine for urban parking lots, adjusting rates in real-time based on demand, traffic, and competitor prices.

title: Animemāketto - Anime Merchandise E-commerce Website
